title: Router port for league of Legends?
body: I have a WRT120N wireless router and me and my roommate have a problem when we both try to play league of legends at the same time. Our latency spikes to 1200-3200 ms depending on the type of game. I have done some research and everything points to opening certain ports for league of legends on my router  but a lot of links have been deleted so they take me to an error page instead. Anyone able to help me with the knowledge of what ports I need to open to be able to have multiple league of legends accounts running games at the same time?

replies.body: We have just the tool to help!  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which will automatically configure your ports specifically for League!  Otherwise, you can also use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for specifics.  I hope that helps!
